titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Bicentennial Committee, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:55

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, memoranda, minutes, and reports documenting the activities of Yale's Bicentennial Committee. Included are materials of the Executive Committee, the Art and Decoration Committee, the Entertainment Committee, the Committee on Honorary Degrees, and the Committee on Guests.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 6 (YRG 6), Records of Yale Committees.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Bicentennial Committee, Yale University, Records (RU 155). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, memoranda, minutes, and reports documenting the activities of Yale's Bicentennial Committee. Included are materials of the Executive Committee, the Art and Decoration Committee, the Entertainment Committee, the Committee on Honorary Degrees, and the Committee on Guests.
